title: Entrust Datacard to Present at Upcoming HIMSS Virtual Briefing
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 7:03 AM   Entrust Datacard 
MINNEAPOLIS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Entrust Datacard today announced that it will sponsor and participate in a virtual briefing, “Going Mobile and Getting Smart: Access Patient Information Securely with Trusted Identities,” on Wed. Sept. 16, 2015. The briefing is hosted by the Healthcare Information and Management Systems Society (HIMSS), a global, cause-based, not-for-profit organization focused on better health through information technology. 
Mike Byrnes, senior product manager at Entrust Datacard, will present a session titled “Enabling Digital Healthcare with Trusted Identities.” The presentation will explore various topics surrounding the role of mobile in creating more secure, more convenient, multi-purpose trusted identities within a healthcare enterprise and explores a variety of use cases where mobile can be used as healthcare companies look to becoming a password-less enterprise. 
“As more and more healthcare organizations move to using digital identities across a variety of functions – administration, patient care, research or payments – it has become increasingly important to ensure that those identities are trusted and secure, whether patient, provider or other,” said Byrnes. “By providing tools that help healthcare organizations move towards the next generation of trusted identities, we are helping them to not only increase productivity and drive business process improvement, but more importantly, we are helping them to improve the patient care experience.” 
Today’s organizations require the ability to properly authenticate individuals accessing networks and applications to protect from the theft or altering of sensitive information. Entrust Datacard works with thousands of organizations to authenticate and protect critical information -- combining the security and convenience of mobile devices. 
To learn more about or to register for the virtual briefing, click here . 
About Entrust Datacard 
Consumers, citizens and employees increasingly expect anywhere-anytime experiences — whether they are making purchases, crossing borders, accessing e-gov services or logging onto corporate networks. Entrust Datacard offers the trusted identity and secure transaction technologies that make those experiences reliable and secure. Solutions range from the physical world of financial cards, passports and ID cards to the digital realm of authentication, certificates and secure communications. With more than 2,000 Entrust Datacard colleagues around the world, and a network of strong global partners, the company serves customers in 150 countries worldwide.
